author: burton
msg: - patch to the Jetspeed disk cache from Santiago Gala (thank you!)
I send you my diffs, as well as a JetspeedXMLReaderFactory.java (in package
xml) to make Xerces requests to fetch the DTDs go through the cache.
The changes make miscellaneous bug fixes and a working search application
and DiskDaemon/BadURLDaemon/Cache. It should compile under jdk1.2 only, but
I'm thinking in how could we remove the dependency from jdk1.2
I think it is stable enough, but I have not tested these changes under
- init of a new peer infrastructure for the registry
- the test inf. now saves the jetspeed-turbine.log for analysis
